page.title: 09The Mayor of Henley
page.content: On Thursday a day in June, we interviewed Mr.Carson-Bury the Mayor of Henley he has a Deputy Mayor who helps the mayor. The mayor is very important to Henley. He presides over the Town Council Meetings and serves on many committees. He meets many famous people including Royalty. As he is the Mayor of Henley, he is involved in the very famous Regatta each summer. The Mayor has his own room in the Town Hall. It is called the Mayor's Parlour. In it is the Mayor's chair which is called the Throne and there is a safe which holds the chain of office and there are water coloured paintings on the walls. The Mayor has to wear full robes when it is Mayor making day that is when they elect a new Mayor. It is dne every year. He also wear's full robes when he is invited as the Mayor.
